actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1074.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11877 to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1978, and to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979, for the Peace Corps, and to make certain changes in the Peace Corps Act.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 11877 (Appropriations authorization for the Peace Corps).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 11877 to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1978, and to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979, for the Peace Corps, and to make certain changes in the Peace Corps Act.
